com.vernalis.pdbconnector

Class ComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.pdbconnector.ComponentFactory
  • Deprecated. 
    Use ComponentFactory2

    @Deprecated
public class ComponentFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class for creating KNIME SettingsModel and DialogComponent objects dynamically from PdbConnectorConfig definition objects (QueryOption, QueryParam and ReportField).
    See Also:
    QueryOption, QueryParam, ReportField2

    • Method Detail

      • createSelectionSettingsModel

        public static org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModelBoolean createSelectionSettingsModel(QueryOption query)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new Boolean settings model to control the selection status of a query option. The SettingsModel name is defined as the QueryOption id with a ".SELECTED" suffix.
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the Boolean settings model.

      • createSelectionSettingsModel

        public static org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModelBoolean createSelectionSettingsModel(ReportField field)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new Boolean settings model to control the selection status of a report field. The SettingsModel name is equal to the ReportField id.
        Parameters:
        field - the field
        Returns:
        the Boolean settings model

      • createSelectionDialogComponent

        public static org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.DialogComponentBoolean createSelectionDialogComponent(QueryOption query)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new Boolean dialog component to control the selection status of a query option. This creates a new underlying Boolean SettingsModel as well.
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the Boolean dialog component.

      • createSelectionDialogComponent

        public static org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.DialogComponentBoolean createSelectionDialogComponent(ReportField field)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new Boolean dialog component to control the selection status of a report field. This creates a new underlying Boolean SettingsModel as well.
        Parameters:
        field - the field
        Returns:
        the Boolean dialog component.

      • createSettingsModel

        public static java.util.List<org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModel> createSettingsModel(QueryParam param)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates the settings model(s) required to represent a single query param. All settings models are enabled.
        Parameters:
        param - the query param
        Returns:
        the list of settings model(s)

      • createSettingsModels

        public static java.util.List<org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModel> createSettingsModels(QueryParam param,
                                                                                                         boolean isEnabled)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates the settings model(s) required to represent a single query param. The enabled status of the settings models is controlled by the isEnabled argument.
        Parameters:
        param - the query param
        isEnabled - settings model enabled status
        Returns:
        the list of settings model(s)

      • createDialogComponents

        public static java.util.List<org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.DialogComponent> createDialogComponents(QueryParam param)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates the dialog component(s) required to represent a single query param. All settings models and dialog components are enabled.
        Parameters:
        param - the query param
        Returns:
        the list of dialog component(s)

      • createDialogComponents

        public static java.util.List<org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.DialogComponent> createDialogComponents(QueryParam param,
                                                                                                             boolean isEnabled)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates the dialog component(s) required to represent a single query param. The enabled status of the settings models and dialog components is controlled by the isEnabled argument.
        Parameters:
        param - the query param
        isEnabled - settings model enabled status
        Returns:
        the list of dialog components

      • setNumberFormat

        public static void setNumberFormat(org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.DialogComponentNumber dlg,
                                   java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the number format on a number dialog component. This method sets the number format on all JSpinner subcomponent instances in the dialog panel.
        Parameters:
        dlg - the dialog component
        formatPattern - the number format pattern
        See Also:
        getAllSubComponents(java.awt.Container, java.util.List<java.awt.Component>)

        Deprecated. 
        Gets list of all UI subcomponents in UI container (recursive call).
        Parameters:
        container - the UI container to traverse
        retVal - partial return list (from previous recursive calls)
        Returns:
        the list of all sub components
